author: Sundaresh Menon CJ (delivering the judgment of the court ex tempore):
casenumber: Court of Appeal — Civil Appeal Nos 42 and 43 of 2017
casename: CIFG Special Assets Capital I Ltd (formerly known as Diamond Kendall Ltd) v Ong Puay Koon and others and another appeal
coram: Sundaresh Menon CJ, Andrew Phang Boon Leong JA and Steven Chong JA
counsel: Teo Chun-Wei Benedict and Poon Guokun Nicholas (Drew & Napier LLC) for the appellant in Civil Appeal No 42 of 2017 and the respondents in Civil Appeal 43 of 2017;Tan Chee Meng S.C., Lim Xian Yong Alvin and Ho Wei Jie Vincent (WongPartnership LLP) for the respondents in Civil Appeal No 42 of 2017 and the appellants in Civil Appeal 43 of 2017.
